attribution_window.title: Attribution Window
attribution_window.description: A period of time for attributing results to ads and the lookback period after those actions occur during which ad results are counted.

project_timezone.title: Project Timezone
project_timezone.description: Can be found in the project settings

select_properties_by_default.title: Select Properties By Default
select_properties_by_default.description: Ensures that new properties on events and engage records are captured automatically.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: If not set, the connector will replicate data from up to one year ago by default.

date_window_size.title: Date slicing window
date_window_size.description: You can reduce it, if amount of data in each window is too big for your environment.
